## Course Overview

Based on demand from industry and government, we're organising a 2-day course on Data Science for Transport Planning, specifically designed for transport planning practitioners. This course will take place on the 18th and 19th of September.

## Learning Objectives

- Understand the role of data science in transport planning.
- Learn how to collect, manage, and analyze transport data.
- Gain practical experience through case studies and interactive workshops.
- Develop skills in data visualization and reporting.

## Prerequisites

- Basic knowledge of transport planning concepts.
- Familiarity with data analysis tools and techniques is beneficial but not required.
